DOC.brief_summary: This prospective observational study will investigate predictive values of virological response in peginterferon/ribavirin treatment-naive patients with chronic hepatitis C. Patients will be treated with Pegasys (peg-interferon alpha 2a) and Copegus (ribavirin) as prescribed by the physician. Data will be collected for 72 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study of Pegasys and Copegus in Treatment-Naive Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C
DOC.criteria: Adult patients, >/=18 years of age Diagnosis of chronic hepatitis C infection Coinfection with human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) and/or hepatitis B Patients previously treated with peginterferon/ribavirin Participation in another clinical study within 30 prior to study start of ML25544
